responses: Visiting hours are from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM.
Visits are allowed from 3:00 PM to 5:00 PM.
You can visit patients from 9:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
The emergency room is open 24 hours a day.
To schedule a medical appointment, call 123-456-7890.
The hospital cafeteria is open from 7:00 AM to 8:00 PM.
Visitors must wear masks and follow social distancing guidelines.
Parking is available for visitors on the east side of the building.
Doctors are available for consultations from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
Please check in at the front desk upon arrival for your appointment.
The pharmacy hours are from 10:00 AM to 6:00 PM, Monday to Friday.
Patients can have two visitors at a time during visiting hours.
Please silence your cell phone while in the hospital.
The gift shop is located near the main entrance and is open until 7:00 PM.
Lab test results are usually available within 24 to 48 hours.
For emergency medical assistance, dial 911 immediately.
The hospital offers free WiFi for patients and visitors.
Interpreter services are available for non-English speaking patients.
The hospital follows strict sanitation protocols to ensure safety.
Family members can call the patient's room directly for updates.
Please respect quiet hours from 10:00 PM to 6:00 AM.
Physical therapy sessions can be scheduled by referral from a doctor.
To refill a prescription, please contact the pharmacy at least 48 hours in advance.
The hospital provides a variety of support services for patients and families.
